1/2 cup cream cheese, softened,1/2 cup sour cream,2 teaspoons smoked paprika,1 teaspoon onion powder,1 teaspoon garlic powder,1 pinch Aleppo pepper,5 sundried tomato tortilla wraps,1/2 cup diced tomatoes with green chilies,8 ounces heddar cheese, shredded,8 ounces grilled chicken breast strips,1/2 cup guacamole, or as needed (optional),,
